title: Travis Scott's Rumored Mistress YungSweetRo Just Asked Everyone To 'Stop Spreading Lies'
text:
View photos Photo credit: Getty Images More

From Women's Health

Travis Scott is being accused of cheating on Kylie Jenner with an Instagram model named YungSweetRo.

YungSweetRo hit IG stories and denied the allegations.

The internet is fully spiraling in the wake of Travis Scott and Kylie Jenner's breakup—and naturally everyone's spiraled straight into a fabricated cheating scandal. Yesterday, Instagram posts and Twitter threads started popping up alleging that Travis had cheated on Kylie with Rojean Kar (aka YungSweetRo), which...nope! Not so much!



E! News reports that Rojean hit up her (now private) Instagram Stories and wrote "None of these rumors are true, it's just the internet creating a false narrative. Please stop spreading lies & leave him, her & I alone because it's affecting real lives. Thank you."





"Yungsweetro" posted something about rumors between Travis Scott and her. She said everything is fake. Waht do you think?💆 pic.twitter.com/M6VkdNQRnr — BADGALIGGY👑🍒 (@Badgaliggy) October 3, 2019





Good to know. And meanwhile, an Us Weekly source also reiterated that the cheating rumors are a reach, saying "Any rumors of cheating are totally and completely false and press should really report on facts rather than rumors and speculation.”

FYI that the real reason for Kylie and Travis' split was non-stop fighting and also (apparently) the fact that Kylie was ready for marriage and another baby, while Travis wasn't. But either way Kylie says she and Travis are working on their "friendship" and concentrating on their daughter Stormi:

Travis and i are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi ‼️ our friendship and our daughter is priority — Kylie Jenner (@KylieJenner) October 3, 2019

P.S. Kylie's also not actually dating her ex-boyfriend Tyga again (despite rolling up to his recording studio late Tuesday night) in case that whole thing was stressing you out. Which let's be real: it was.
